description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中共中央总书记胡锦涛的夫人，曾担任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese political figure, wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Hu Jintao, and former deputy director of the Beijing Municipal Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清之女，上海宋庆龄学校国际部专家委员会秘书长。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, Secretary General of the Expert Committee of the International Division of Shanghai Soong Ching Ling School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，胡锦涛与刘永清之子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, son of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, currently serving as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人配偶的非正式头衔。
description.en: The informal title for the spouse of the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中共中央总书记江泽民的夫人。
description.en: Chinese political figure, wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 歌唱家，现任中共中央总书记习近平的夫人。
description.en: Singer and wife of the current General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的山东省行政区划。
description.en: The administrative division of Shandong Province during the Republic of China era.

nodes.id: 北京市城乡规划委员会

zh-cn: 北京市城乡规划委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京市政府的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the Beijing Municipal Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的著名中学。
description.en: A renowned secondary school located in Chongqing, China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾存在的政府部门，主管水利和电力工业。
description.en: A former government ministry of the People's Republic of China, responsible for water resources and the electric power industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国新闻工作者，曾任光明日报总编辑，刘永清的舅舅。
description.en: Chinese journalist, former editor-in-chief of Guangming Daily, and Liu Yongqing's maternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清的姐姐，曾任中国社会科学院副院长、党总支副书记。
description.en: Liu Yongqing's elder sister, who served as Vice President and Deputy Secretary of the Party General Branch of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心。
description.en: The premier academic organization and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前国务院总理李鹏的夫人。
description.en: Chinese political figure, wife of former Premier of the State Council Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管民政事务的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 企业家，前新浪董事长，胡海青的丈夫。
description.en: Entrepreneur, former chairman of Sina Corp, and husband of Hu Haiqing.

description.zh-cn: 美国前第一夫人，乔治·W·布什的妻子。
description.en: Former First Lady of the United States, wife of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一家以旅游为主业的中国公司，由中国共产主义青年团中央委员会控股。
description.en: A Chinese company primarily engaged in tourism, controlled by the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清与胡锦涛于1970年2月结婚，两人是清华大学的同班同学。
description.en: Liu Yongqing married Hu Jintao in February 1970; they were classmates at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰是刘永清的儿子。
description.en: Hu Haifeng is the son of Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰是胡锦涛的儿子。
description.en: Hu Haifeng is the son of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清于1959年考入清华大学水利系，1965年毕业。
description.en: Liu Yongqing was admitted to the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1959 and graduated in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清于1953年入读重庆市巴蜀中学校。
description.en: Liu Yongqing enrolled in Chongqing Bashu Secondary School in 1953.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一配偶
position.en: First Spouse of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，刘永清作为其夫人履行“第一配偶”的职责。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Liu Yongqing fulfilled the duties of the "First Spouse" as his wife.

relationships.target: 北京市城乡规划委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘永清曾担任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: Liu Yongqing served as the deputy director of the Beijing Municipal Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1982年胡锦涛调入共青团中央后，刘永清在团中央下属的中青旅担任副总经理。
description.en: After Hu Jintao was transferred to the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League in 1982, Liu Yongqing served as the deputy general manager of CYTS, a subsidiary of the league.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清1940年10月3日出生于中华民国时期的山东省。
description.en: Liu Yongqing was born on October 3, 1940, in Shandong Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清接替王冶坪（江泽民夫人）成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Liu Yongqing succeeded Wang Yeping (wife of Jiang Zemin) as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛（习近平夫人）接替刘永清成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Peng Liyuan (wife of Xi Jinping) succeeded Liu Yongqing as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，刘永清于1969年3月被下放到宁夏青铜峡五七干校。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Yongqing was sent to the May Seventh Cadre School in Qingtongxia, Ningxia, in March 1969.

description.zh-cn: 刘永平是刘永清的姐姐。
description.en: Liu Yongping is Liu Yongqing's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 常芝青是刘永清的舅舅。
description.en: Chang Zhiging is Liu Yongqing's maternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 常芝青与姚依林交好。
description.en: Chang Zhiging was on good terms with Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清与朱琳是重庆市巴蜀中学校的校友。
description.en: Liu Yongqing and Zhu Lin were schoolmates at Chongqing Bashu Secondary School.

description.zh-cn: 朱琳是李鹏的夫人。
description.en: Zhu Lin is the wife of Li Peng.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Hu Haifeng currently serves as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青的丈夫是茅道林。
description.en: Hu Haiqing's husband is Mao Daolin.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，刘永清与时任美国第一夫人劳拉·布什在白宫会面。
description.en: In 2006, Liu Yongqing met with then-U.S. First Lady Laura Bush at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月25日，刘永清以胡锦涛夫人身份首次亮相，迎接时任美国总统比尔·克林顿。
description.en: On June 25, 1998, Liu Yongqing made her first public appearance as Hu Jintao's wife to welcome then-U.S. President Bill Clinton.
